item.description:
SATURDAY August 14 at 8 pm - Finian’s Rainbow at The Ivoryton Playhouse with The CT Theatre Group 20% Discount

Finian’s Rainbow
By E.Y Harburg and Fred Saidy
Music by Burton Lane
Lyrics by E.Y Harburg

Did you ever wonder How are things in Glocca Morra? Or what would happen under an Old Devil Moon? Enter the irresistible world of two Irish immigrants who come to America and live with poor, good-hearted American farmers; southern bigots - and a leprechaun! – in one of America’s classic and most original musicals.

Tickets are $38

20% DISCOUNT on Advance Ticket!

Advance Tickets are $31.50

Pick up your ticket at the will call window

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888


2010 Tony Awards Best Revival of a Musical (nominee)

Best Leading Actress in a Musical, Kate Baldwin (nominee)

Best Featured Actor in a Musical, Christopher Fitzgerald (nominee)



2010 Drama Desk Awards

Outstanding Revival of a Musical (nominee)

Outstanding Actor in a Musical, Cheyenne Jackson (nominee)

Outstanding Actress in a Musical, Kate Baldwin (nominee)

Outstanding Featured Actor in a Musical, Christopher Fitzgerald (nominee)

Outstanding Featured Actress in a Musical, Terri White (nominee)

Outstanding Director of a Musical, Warren Carlyle (nominee)

Outstanding Choreography, Warren Carlyle (nominee)

Outstanding Sound Design in a Musical, Scott Lehrer (nominee)



2010 Outer Critics Circle Award

Outstanding Revival of a Musical (Broadway or Off-Broadway) (nominee)

Outstanding Actress in a Musical, Kate Baldwin (nominee)

Outstanding Featured Actor in a Musical, Christopher Fitzgerald (nominee)

Outstanding Featured Actress in a Musical, Terri White (nominee)

Ivoryton Playhouse
103 Main Street
Ivoryton, CT 0644 (Ivoryton is part of Essex)

Only 15 minutes from Middletown

From North. Hartford, Middletown:

Take Rte. 9 South. Get off at Exit 4, Middlesex Turnpike/Centerbrook (approximately 18 miles south of Middletown). Turn right at end of exit ramp onto Rte. 154/Main Street. Travel about 7/10 of a mile to the first traffic light. Turn right and travel 1.5 miles to the theatre, located on the right.

From South/West. New York, New Haven:

Get on I-95 North. Get off at Exit 65, Westbrook. Take a left at end of ramp onto Rte. 153. Travel four miles to the third traffic light. At light turn left. At the next light, turn left. The theatre is located one and one-half miles on the right.

From East. New London, Niantic:

Get on I-95 South. Get off at Exit 69. Bear right onto Rte. 9N. Get off at Exit 3. Go left at end of exit ramp. Continue straight through on Rte. 154/ Main Street for approximately two and one-half miles. The theatre is located on the right.

From Old Saybrook:

Get on Rte. 9 North. Get off at Exit 3. At end of exit ramp, take a left. Continue straight through on Rte. 154/Main Street for approximately two and one-half miles. The theatre is located on the right.

Parking is available across the street from the theatre.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket at the will call window
